extendedInfo.description: Are you sad ? Do yopu want to be Happy ?We care for you to have Happy Moments in your life. We suggest 100+ Ways to be Happy that helps to change your mood and brings you smile on face. This app has short, quik and easy quotes to feel you Happy.This are not just quotes, it's quotes about happiness, inspiration, motivation. This quotes helps to bring positive energy within yourself and engages you in activity which changes your mood and brings smile & happiness in your life.If you are happy and pleased with this app, please feel free to reply.Keep smiling, Stay Happy and Live Long.... :-)
